code: var dataAbout=[{id:1,title:'NFT as insurance',desc:'By tokenizing insurance policies as NFTs,NFTs as insurance involve using blockchain technology to create and manage digital assets that represent insurance policies or coverage.'},{id:2,title:'NFT as a Collateral for Loan',desc:'NFTs, being unique digital assets, When an individual wants to obtain a loan, they can pledge their NFT as collateral, which provides assurance to the lender that there is an underlying asset of value to secure the loan.'},{id:3,title:'NFT Marketplace',desc:'An NFT marketplace is a digital platform where non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are bought, sold, and traded. NFTs represent ownership or proof of authenticity for a wide range of digital and physical items, including artwork, collectibles, virtual real estate.'}];export default dataAbout;
